https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gF5VslUB2xpWbboc735VVnO7DXh.jpg "Boxcar" Bertha Thompson, a transient woman in Arkansas during the violence-filled Depression of the early '30s, meets up with rabble-rousing union man "Big" Bill Shelly and the two team up to fight the corrupt railroad establishment. Boxcar Bertha
